column4: guys, i have 2 partitions on my hdd, 1 for windows, and 1 for linux, is there any way to make my linux partition larger, now that linux and windows are installed? im low in disk space on my linux partition
the safest route is to use a closed-source tool like Partition Magic; I don't know if fips (a Partition Magic type program) is 100% safe.
(of course, no partition resizer is 100% safe)
